documents.name: Rec Room Gift Card Terms & Conditions

points.title: You waive your right to a class action.
points.status: The Gift Card Terms and Conditions states "Any arbitration under these Terms will take place on an individual basis: class arbitrations and class actions are not permitted.  YOU UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THESE TERMS, YOU AND REC ROOM ARE EACH WAIVING THE RIGHT TO TRIAL BY JURY OR TO PARTICIPATE IN A CLASS ACTION. "

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
points.status: The privacy policy states "Some cookies on the Services come from third parties. These cookies improve your experience by helping us better tailor our Services to you. For example, Google Analytics may use cookies to collect your Personal Information on our behalf to analyze your use of the Services."

points.title: You maintain ownership of your content
points.status: The Terms of Service state "Rec Room Inc and its licensors exclusively own all right, title and interest in and to the Game, Services, and Content, including all associated intellectual property rights, with the exception of User Content, to which Rec Room Inc does not claim any ownership rights, but rather possesses license rights as described below. "

points.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
points.status:
The Gift Card Terms & Conditions states "We reserve the right to make changes to these Gift Card Terms & Conditions at any time. If we make a material modification to these Gift Card Terms & Conditions, we may provide notice by displaying a notice on our website, by sending an email to any address you may have used to register for a Rec Room account, or through other mechanisms."

Note the " we may provide"

points.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
points.status: The Gift Card Terms and Conditions states "Any arbitration under these Terms will take place on an individual basis: class arbitrations and class actions are not permitted.  YOU UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THESE TERMS, YOU AND REC ROOM ARE EACH WAIVING THE RIGHT TO TRIAL BY JURY OR TO PARTICIPATE IN A CLASS ACTION."

points.title: Your account can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason
points.status: The Terms of Service state "We reserve the right, but are not obligated, to remove, disable or suspend your or any user's access to any Content or the Services, at any time and without notice, including, but not limited to, if we, at our sole discretion, consider any Content or activity when using the Services to be objectionable or in violation of these Terms. "

points.title: App required for this service requires broad device permissions
points.status: The privacy policy states that while using the Rec Room app "We may collect your play history, running/loaded dynamic link library ("DLLs") on your computer or data gathered from a "small memory dump.""

points.title: This Service provides a list of Third Parties involved in its operation.
points.status:
The privacy policy states:

We and the third-party service providers listed below may collect or maintain Children's Personal Information through the Services.

    Exit Games GmbH
    Amplitude, Inc.
    Google Analytics
    Microsoft Azure

points.title: Your Personal data may be sold unless you opt out
points.status: The privacy policy states that "We may disclose your Personal Information: [...] To a buyer or other successor in the event of a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, or other sale or transfer of some or all of the Company's assets, whether as a going concern or as part of bankruptcy, liquidation, or similar proceeding, in which Personal Information held by the Company pertaining to the users of our Services is among the assets transferred;"
